Hi,

I have to add some custom features to the 
org.archive.modules.net.RobotsTxt class.
I need to access a custom file which is placed inside the JobDirectory.
I tried a few hours to figure it out but I can't find out how to get the 
current JobDirectory path inside this class. :(

Is there a way to get this path somehow from there?


Thanks,
Markus
